@zahedia75 @goldshellminer They likely won't be making more KD5s when the KD6 will be released soon. (We already have a test unit.) We have the KD5 in-stock. https://t.co/KUqnv3BRr5

@HereForTheFunG @goldshellminer Yeah but everything above 2 years is voluntarily. For most products 2 years is mandatory. And even if the manufacturer doesn't offer it, the reseller must offer it, if they are based within EU.
@cannapitalist @goldshellminer Yeah Europe is great. Some items have 5 years (washer dryer stove etc). US usually 1 year hahah China - whenever the heck they want

@HereForTheFunG @goldshellminer IDK about every country in the world and China especially, but in Europe warranty must be at least 24 months. So if you buy your hardware through a EU based reseller you pay a bonus, but you have at least 24 months warranty.
@goldshellminer 🔥🔥🔥VIP password please and thank you in DM
